name: Rapture of the Deep
description:
Undercity is deserted.

The last time you heard from your brother was a year ago.

You've risked everything to buy enough diving gear to plunge into the depths of the sea and uncover what happened to him - and all of Undercity.

Explore the mystery of Undercity through a compelling narrative and a distinct art style.

Made for Callum Upton's Game Jam.
